headline: PTC Inc. (PTC) Beats Q3 Earnings and Revenue Estimates
summary: PTC Inc. (PTC) delivered earnings and revenue surprises of +34.43% and +10.57%, respectively, for the quarter ended June 2025. Do the numbers hold clues to what lies ahead for the stock?

headline: Industrial software maker PTC raises annual forecast
summary: The Boston-based company's stock rose 3.2% after the bell.  Companies seeking to digitize and tap into the artificial intelligence boom are turning to PTC's software to help them design, manufacture and maintain their products.  PTC is also a beneficiary of elevated demand from customers who are investing heavily in automating their workflows.

headline: PTC Inc.: Fiscal Q3 Earnings Snapshot
summary: BOSTON (AP) — PTC Inc. PTC) on Wednesday reported fiscal third-quarter net income of $141.3 million. The Boston-based company said it had net income of $1.17 per share.

raw.headline: PTC Inc.: Fiscal Q3 Earnings Snapshot

headline: PTC (NASDAQ:PTC) Reports Upbeat Q2, Stock Soars
summary: Engineering and design software provider PTC (NASDAQ:PTC) reported Q2 CY2025 results exceeding the market’s revenue expectations, with sales up 24.2% year on year to $643.9 million. On top of that, next quarter’s revenue guidance ($755 million at the midpoint) was surprisingly good and 5.6% above what analysts were expecting. Its GAAP profit of $1.17 per share was 45.8% above analysts’ consensus estimates.

headline: PTC to Accelerate the Design and Simulation of AI Infrastructure and Complex Products with NVIDIA Omniverse
summary: PTC (NASDAQ: PTC) today announced that it is expanding the scope of its collaboration with NVIDIA, the world leader in accelerated computing. PTC is integrating NVIDIA Omniverse technologies into its Creo® computer-aided design (CAD) and Windchill® product lifecycle management (PLM) solutions to transform how manufacturers and product companies design, simulate, and collaborate on complex products — including the foundational hardware of AI infrastructure, such as high-performance PCBs, advanced
